title: Bug 41558Unnecessary synchronization caused by JspFactory.getDefaultFactory while servicing JSPs
description: Tomcat version: 6.0.x trunkEvery generated JSP hastry {jspxFactory = JspFactory.getDefaultFactory();response.setContentType("text/html");in its jspService method.The use of JspFactory.getDefaultFactory during request processing should beavoided as it is a static synchronized method.I have a diff that addresses this and will attach it to this bug.
